page.title: 16NEW PIER AT CRANFIELD
page.content:
CRANFIELD PIER IS BEING ENLARGED SO THAT THE PLEASURE BOAT THE MAID OF ANTRIM CAN DOCK THERE. THERE IS A BREAKWATER AS LONG AS 140 FEET FROM THE LAND AND AS DEEP AS 12 FEET.THERE IS ANOTHER SMALLER BREAKWATER. THE CHANNEL IS BEING DEEPENED ALSO SO THAT THE LARGE BOAT WILL NOT SCRATCH HER HULL ON THE BOTTOM. THE ENTIRE AREA WILL BE LAID OUT IN LAWNS AND CONCRETE PATHS AND PICNIC TABLES PROVIDED SO THAT VISITORS WILL ENJOY THEIR VISIT TO THE LOUGH SHORE.
THE SHELTERED SIDE OF THE BREAKWATER IS CALM AND SAFE AND WILL BE USED FOR SWIMMING AND FISHING.THE MAID OF ANTRIM TAKES VISITORS ON A 2 HOUR TRIP ROUND THE LOUGH AND GOES OUT TWICE DAILY IN THE SUMMER SEASON.
